SENTENCE.STRING: (13,722 ft / 4,182 m) is located in the Wind River Range in the U.S. state of Wyoming.
is the third highest peak in the range and the fourth in the state.
The summit is located in the Fitzpatrick Wilderness of Shoshone National Forest and rises above several glaciers, the best known being Dinwoody Glacier which is immediately north of the summit tower.
